name: Kawaii School Girl is a Dude Magnet!
name_original: Kawaii School Girl is a Dude Magnet!
description:
Use your charisma as a weapon to manipulate boys into hurting themselves. Attract them with your appeal or Repel them with an unflattering face!
Defeat boys to earn money and level up. Purchase upgrades to make yourself stronger!

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Dash - Space
  • Attract - P
  • Repel - O

Made within 72 hours for ScoreSpace Jam #18
